橏字的基本解释

橏
zhǎn
树瘤。
古书上说的一种树。

橏
jiǎn
〔橏榐〕树长貌。

橏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》旨善切，上獮，章。］
(1)木名。
(2)木瘤。
(3)枯木。
[②]［jiǎn］
见“橏2榐”。

橏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橏； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页553第07
【唐韻】旨善切，音樿。木瘤也。　又【集韻】九件切，音蹇。【博雅】㮈也。　又橏榐，見榐字註。

橏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
橏字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。或指树长貌。

Basic explanation of words
Wipe
zhǎn
Tree tumor.
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
Wipe
jiǎn
〔橏榐〕The tree looks long.
Wipe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" aims to be good, first, chapter. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) Wood tumor.
(3) Dead wood.
[②]［jiǎn］
See "橏2榐".
Wipe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橏; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 553 No. 07
[Tang Yun] The purpose is good and cut, and the sound is yin. Wood tumor also.　[Jiyun] Nine pieces cut, with sound. [Bo Ya] 㮈 also.　 橏榐 again, see the note of the word 榐.

Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books. Or refers to the appearance of the tree.
